trans-unit.source: Provides supplemental metadata to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供补充元数据向<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The TypeDescriptionProvider class dynamically extends the type information associated with a type or object by adding, modifying, or hiding characteristics such as attributes, properties, and events.
trans-unit.target: TypeDescriptionProvider 类动态扩展通过添加、 修改或隐藏如属性、 属性和事件的特征与类型或对象关联的类型信息。

trans-unit.source: There can be multiple type description provider classes that offer metadata to a single <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 可以有多个提供到单个<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>的元数据的类型说明提供程序类

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to associate a TypeDescriptionProvider with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>: - At design time, when the target class can be assigned the appropriate <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProviderAttribute> tag.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法将关联与 TypeDescriptionProvider <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>:-在设计时，当目标类可以分配相应<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProviderAttribute>标记。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProviderAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: - At run time, when one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A> methods of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class can be called.
trans-unit.target: -在运行时，当其中一个的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A>方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>可以调用类。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: These overloaded methods require either the target object or its class type.
trans-unit.target: 这些重载的方法需要目标对象或其类的类型。

trans-unit.source: The TypeDescriptionProvider class relies on a parent object of the same type, supplied during construction.
trans-unit.target: TypeDescriptionProvider 类依赖于相同类型，会在构造过程中提供的父对象。

trans-unit.source: This allows classes that derive from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor> to selectively override methods.
trans-unit.target: 这允许派生自的类<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>有选择地重写方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Instances of TypeDescriptionProvider are only built upon demand, minimizing the impact of custom type information on performance.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要，将对性能的自定义的类型信息的影响降至最低仅生成 TypeDescriptionProvider 的实例。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to calling the other <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%29> constructor with a parameter value that is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数等效于调用的其他<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%29>构造函数的参数值`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider"></xref> class using a parent type description provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider"></xref>类使用的父类型说明提供。

trans-unit.source: If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider> methods will return default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`parent`参数是`null`，所有<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>方法将返回默认值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, all <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider> methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为所有<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>方法会将对方法的委托`parent`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the default return values for <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的默认返回值<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>

trans-unit.source: |Method|Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetCache%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.CreateInstance%2A>|A newly created object through a call to the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetExtendedTypeDescriptor%2A>|A default instance of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor> class.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A>|A default instance of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor> class.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>|The `objectType` first parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |方法 |默认返回值 | |------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetCache%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.CreateInstance%2A>|新创建的对象，通过对<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A>方法的调用。 | |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetExtendedTypeDescriptor%2A>|<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>类的默认实例。 | |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A>|<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>类的默认实例。 | |<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>|`objectType`第一个参数。 |</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetExtendedTypeDescriptor%2A> </xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.CreateInstance%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parent type description provider.
trans-unit.target: 父类型说明提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Creates an object that can substitute for another data type.
trans-unit.target: 创建可替换为另一种数据类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IServiceProvider> specified by the `provider` parameter is passed in by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IServiceProvider>指定的`provider`参数传入<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>类。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is not `null`, the service provider can be used by the type description provider to obtain additional context about the creation call.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`不`null`，服务提供商可以由类型说明提供程序用于获取有关创建调用的附加上下文。

trans-unit.source: The CreateInstance method is `virtual` and, by default, returns the result of the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method if `provider` is `null`.
trans-unit.target: CreateInstance 方法是`virtual`和默认情况下，返回的结果<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法如果`provider`是`null`。</xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `provider` is `null`, this method will invoke the CreateInstance method of the parent provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果`provider`是`null`，此方法将调用父提供程序的 CreateInstance 方法。

trans-unit.source: An optional service provider.
trans-unit.target: 可选的服务提供程序中。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is never <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An optional array of types that represent the parameter types to be passed to the object's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 表示要传递给对象的构造函数的参数类型的类型的可选数组。

trans-unit.source: This array can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or of zero length.
trans-unit.target: 此数组可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或长度为零。

trans-unit.source: An optional array of parameter values to pass to the object's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给对象的构造函数的参数值的可选数组。

trans-unit.source: The substitute <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 替代<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a per-object cache, accessed as an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 获取每个对象访问的缓存，作为<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的键/值对。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> may need to perform complex operations on collections of metadata.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>可能需要执行对集合的元数据的复杂操作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Because types are not unloaded for the life of a domain, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class will automatically cache the results of these operations based on type.
trans-unit.target: 由于类型不卸载域的整个生命周期<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>类将自动缓存基于类型这些操作的结果。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: However, some operations use live object instances.
trans-unit.target: 但是，某些操作使用实时对象实例。

trans-unit.source: These operations cannot be cached within the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class because caching them would prevent the object from being garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 这些操作不能缓存内<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>类，因为缓存它们将阻止对象被垃圾回收。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class allows for a per-object cache, accessed as an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of key/value pairs, to exist on an object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>类允许为每个对象缓存，作为访问<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的键/值对，以在对象上存在。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The GetCache method returns an instance of this cache.
trans-unit.target: 调用 GetCache 方法返回此缓存的实例。

trans-unit.source: The GetCache method will return `null` if there is no supported cache for an object.
trans-unit.target: GetCache 方法将返回`null`如果对象不支持的缓存。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider> used by <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> examines the object to see if it is a sited component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDictionaryService> interface.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>由<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>检查对象是否实现已就位的组件<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDictionaryService>接口。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDictionaryService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>

trans-unit.source: If the object is, it uses the dictionary service to store the object's cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象是，它使用字典服务来存储对象的缓存。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the object it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它返回的对象`null`。

trans-unit.source: Other type description providers may provide their own implementation here.
trans-unit.target: 其他类型说明提供程序可能会提供自己在本文中的实现。

trans-unit.source: For example, dependency objects can just attach a property of type <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，依赖项对象只可以附加类型<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的属性

trans-unit.source: The object for which to get the cache.
trans-unit.target: 要为其获取缓存对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> if the provided object supports caching; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>如果所提供的对象支持缓存; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets an extended custom type descriptor for the given object.
trans-unit.target: 给定的对象中获取扩展的自定义类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: An extended type descriptor is a custom type descriptor that offers properties that other objects have added to this object, but that are not actually defined on the object.
trans-unit.target: 扩展的类型描述符是的提供属性的其他对象添加到此对象，但不实际对象定义的自定义类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model, objects that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> interface can attach properties to other objects that reside in the same logical container.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]组件模型对象实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider>接口可以将属性附加到驻留在相同的逻辑容器中的其他对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider>

trans-unit.source: The overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> methods do not return a type descriptor that provides these extra extended properties.
trans-unit.target: 重载<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A>方法不返回提供这些额外的扩展属性的类型描述符。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GetExtendedTypeDescriptor method returns the set of these extended properties.
trans-unit.target: GetExtendedTypeDescriptor 方法返回这些扩展的属性的集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> will automatically merge the results of these two property collections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>将自动合并这两个属性集合的结果。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: While the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model supports only extended properties, GetExtendedTypeDescriptor can be used for extended attributes as well as events, if the type description provider supports it.
trans-unit.target: 虽然[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]组件模型支持仅扩展的属性，GetExtendedTypeDescriptor 可用于扩展的属性，以及事件，如果类型说明提供程序支持它。

trans-unit.source: GetExtendedTypeDescriptor is `virtual` and, by default, returns a custom type descriptor that returns empty results if no parent provider was passed.
trans-unit.target: GetExtendedTypeDescriptor 是`virtual`和默认情况下，将返回自定义类型描述符返回空结果，如果未不传递任何父提供程序。

trans-unit.source: If a parent provider was passed, this method will invoke the parent provider's GetExtendedTypeDescriptor method.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了父提供程序，该方法将调用父提供程序的 GetExtendedTypeDescriptor 方法。

trans-unit.source: The object for which to get the extended type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 要为其获取的扩展的类型描述符对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"></xref> that can provide extended metadata for the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"> </xref>可以为该对象提供扩展元数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the extender providers for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定对象的扩展程序提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The object to get extender providers for.
trans-unit.target: 要获取扩展程序提供程序的对象。

trans-unit.source: An array of extender providers for instance.
trans-unit.target: 扩展程序提供程序的数组 instance 。

trans-unit.source: instance is .
trans-unit.target: instanceis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the specified component, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the component has no name.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定组件的名称或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果该组件没有名称。

trans-unit.source: The specified component.
trans-unit.target: 指定的组件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 指定组件的名称。

trans-unit.source: component is .
trans-unit.target: componentis .

trans-unit.source: Performs normal reflection against the given object.
trans-unit.target: 针对执行正常反射给定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A> method is a lower-level version of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>方法是较低级别版本<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no custom type descriptor can be located for an object, <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A> is called to perform normal reflection against the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以找到一个对象，没有自定义类型描述符<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>调用以执行与对象的正常反射。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload if you have called a type descriptor member that uses an instance instead of a type.
trans-unit.target: 如果已调用使用而不是一种类型的实例的类型描述符成员，请使用此方法重载。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the type (should not be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: 类型的实例 (不应为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>)。

trans-unit.source: The type of reflection for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此的反射类型 instance 。

trans-unit.source: instance is .
trans-unit.target: instanceis .

trans-unit.source: Performs normal reflection against a type.
trans-unit.target: 针对执行正常反射类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A> method is a lower-level version of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>方法是较低级别版本<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no custom type descriptor can be located for an object, <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A> is called to perform normal reflection against the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以找到一个对象，没有自定义类型描述符<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>调用以执行与对象的正常反射。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload if you have called a type descriptor member that uses a type instead of an instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果已调用而不是实例使用的类型的类型描述符成员，请使用此方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The type of object for which to retrieve the <xref href="System.Reflection.IReflect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为其检索对象的类型<xref href="System.Reflection.IReflect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type of reflection for this objectType.
trans-unit.target: 此的反射类型 objectType 。

trans-unit.source: objectType is .
trans-unit.target: objectTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Performs normal reflection against the given object with the given type.
trans-unit.target: 执行与给定的对象具有给定类型的正常反射。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A> method is a lower-level version of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>方法是较低级别版本<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no custom type descriptor can be located for an object, <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A> is called to perform normal reflection against the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以找到一个对象，没有自定义类型描述符<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>调用以执行与对象的正常反射。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of object for which to retrieve the <xref href="System.Reflection.IReflect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为其检索对象的类型<xref href="System.Reflection.IReflect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type of reflection for this objectType.
trans-unit.target: 此的反射类型 objectType 。

trans-unit.source: Converts a reflection type into a runtime type.
trans-unit.target: 将反射类型转换为是运行时类型。

trans-unit.source: The GetRuntimeType method reverses the<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A> method to convert a reflection type back into a runtime type.
trans-unit.target: GetRuntimeType 方法可反转<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>方法将反射类型转换回运行时类型。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetReflectionType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the GetRuntimeType method is preferred over using the <xref:System.Type.UnderlyingSystemType%2A> property, which was used in earlier versions to return the runtime type.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GetRuntimeType 方法优于使用<xref:System.Type.UnderlyingSystemType%2A>属性，它在早期版本中用于返回的运行时类型。</xref:System.Type.UnderlyingSystemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to its runtime equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 要转换为其等效的运行时类型。

trans-unit.source: A that represents the runtime equivalent of reflectionType.
trans-unit.target: A表示的运行时等效项 reflectionType 。

trans-unit.source: reflectionType is .
trans-unit.target: reflectionTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a custom type descriptor for the given object.
trans-unit.target: 给定的对象中获取自定义类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no instance was passed to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果将任何实例不传递给<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"></xref> that can provide metadata for the type.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"> </xref> ，可以提供类型的元数据。

trans-unit.source: instance is .
trans-unit.target: instanceis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a custom type descriptor for the given type.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定类型的自定义类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: The type of object for which to retrieve the type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 为其检索类型描述符的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"></xref> that can provide metadata for the type.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"> </xref> ，可以提供类型的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a custom type descriptor for the given type and object.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定的类型和对象的自定义类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: This method is prototyped as `virtual` and, by default, returns an empty descriptor if no parent provider was passed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的原型为`virtual`并且，如果未不传递任何父提供程序，则默认情况下，返回了空的描述符。

trans-unit.source: If a parent provider was passed, this method will invoke the parent provider's GetTypeDescriptor method.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了父提供程序，该方法将调用父提供程序的 GetTypeDescriptor 方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of object for which to retrieve the type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 为其检索类型描述符的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no instance was passed to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果将任何实例不传递给<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"></xref> that can provide metadata for the type.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"> </xref> ，可以提供类型的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified type is compatible with the type description and its chain of type description providers.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示指定的类型是否兼容的类型说明和其链类型说明提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The type to test for compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 要测试兼容性的类型。

trans-unit.source: if type is compatible with the type description and its chain of type description providers; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 type 兼容的类型说明和其链类型说明提供程序; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: type is .
trans-unit.target: typeis .
